org.jetel.component

Class BulkLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jetel.graph.GraphElement
      • org.jetel.graph.Node
        • org.jetel.component.BulkLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, IGraphElement, CloverWorkerListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    InformixDataWriter, MsSqlDataWriter, MysqlDataWriter, OracleDataWriter, PostgreSqlDataWriter

    public abstract class BulkLoader
extends Node
    It is a base class for all kinds of bulkloaders.
    Since:
    5.2.2009
    See Also:
    TransformationGraph, Node, Edge

    • Method Detail

      • preExecute

        public void preExecute()
                throws ComponentNotReadyException
        Description copied from interface: IGraphElement
        This is also initialization method, which is invoked before each separate graph run. That is, it can be invoked multiple times. Use IGraphElement.firstRun() to determine whether given invocation is the first one. Contrary to the IGraphElement.init() procedure, this method should allocate only resources for this single graph run. All resources allocated in this method should be released in the IGraphElement.postExecute() method.
        Specified by:
        preExecute in interface IGraphElement
        Overrides:
        preExecute in class Node
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException - some of the required resource is not available or other precondition is not accomplish

      • execute

        public Result execute()
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Specified by:

        Throws:

      • init

        public void init()
          throws ComponentNotReadyException
        Description copied from interface: IGraphElement
        Initialization of the graph element. This initialization is done exactly once at the start of the existence of this graph element. All resources which are intended to remain allocated during the whole time of the graph existence (including time between each graph run), should be allocated in this method. All resources allocated in this method should be released in the IGraphElement.free() method.
        Specified by:
        init in interface IGraphElement
        Overrides:
        init in class Node
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException - some of the required resource is not available or other precondition is not accomplish

      • createCommandLineForLoadUtility

        protected abstract java.lang.String[] createCommandLineForLoadUtility()
                                                               throws ComponentNotReadyException
        Create command line for process, where load utility is running.
        Returns:
        array first field is name of load utility and the others fields are parameters
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException - when command file isn't created

      • initDataFormatter

        protected void initDataFormatter()
                          throws ComponentNotReadyException
        Initialization of data formatter used for loading data to the target that is read by load utility. If this method isn't overridden then getColumnDelimiter() and getRecordDelimiter() methods must be implemented.
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException

      • getColumnDelimiter

        protected abstract java.lang.String getColumnDelimiter()
        Return column delimiter that is used for creating load utility metadata. If initDataFormatter() method is overridden then this method couldn't be implemented.
        Returns:
        column delimiter that is used for creating load utility metadata

      • getRecordDelimiter

        protected abstract java.lang.String getRecordDelimiter()
        Return record delimiter that is used for creating load utility metadata. If initDataFormatter() method is overridden then this method couldn't be implemented.
        Returns:
        record delimiter that is used for creating load utility metadata

                        throws ComponentNotReadyException

        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException

      • defaultCreateFileForExchange

        protected void defaultCreateFileForExchange(java.lang.String filePrefix)
                                     throws ComponentNotReadyException
        Create file for exchange for default behavior of bulkloaders. Default behaviour means: - not support reading from stdin; - support both windows and unix like systems (uses pipe at unix)
        Parameters:
        filePrefix -
        Throws:
        ComponentNotReadyException

      • free

        public void free()
        Description copied from interface: IGraphElement
        This is de-initialization method for this graph element. All resources allocated in IGraphElement.init() method should be released here. This method is invoked only once at the end of this graph element existence.
        Specified by:
        free in interface IGraphElement
        Overrides:
        free in class Node

      • setLoadUtilityDateFormat

        protected abstract void setLoadUtilityDateFormat(DataFieldMetadata field)
        If field has format of date or time then default load utility format is set. This method must be implemented only if createLoadUtilityMetadata(DataRecordMetadata, String, String) is used.
        Parameters:
        field -

      • setLoadUtilityDateFormat

        protected static void setLoadUtilityDateFormat(DataFieldMetadata field,
                            java.lang.String timeFm,
                            java.lang.String dateFm,
                            java.lang.String datetimeFm,
                            java.lang.String yearFm)
        Helper method for implementation of setLoadUtilityDateFormat method. If yearFm is null then year format is not supported.
        Parameters:
        field -
        timeFm - time format
        dateFm - date format
        datetimeFm - datetime format
        yearFm - year format
